channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Informix Servers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Informix Servers

item.title: CVE-2017-1508|2024-08-05T13:32:29.957Z -- ibm -- informix%20servers
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server 12.1 could allow a local user logged in with database administrator user to gain root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 129620.

item.title: CVE-2017-1310|2024-08-05T13:32:29.417Z -- ibm -- informix%20servers
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server 12.1 could allow an authenticated user to cause a buffer overflow that would write large assertion fail files to the server. Done enough times, this could use large parts of the file system and cause the server to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 125569.
